title: It's a Man's World... Or is it?
itunes:title: It's a Man's World... Or is it?
description: Women in a man's world? We take a look at the ladies inside the Cigar world, and light up Maria Martin's Ruby. Then we bring on Peter Ackerman, VP of Operations and Business Development, and Head Chef Victor, from Salvatore's Restaurant and smoke Louie Tiante's El Tiante. Cigar Dinners, Industry news, and new cigars hitting the shelves. All this and more on The Cigar Authority.
